item.title: 8/28: CBS Evening News
item.description: Minneapolis church community reeling after deadly school shooting; The legacy of Memphis' WDIA, America's first all-Black radio station

item.title: 8/28: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Why CDC employees are resigning in protest after director's ouster; Reporter's Notebook: Who tells a president the hard truths?

item.title: "De minimis" U.S. tariffs exemption for low-value imports ends
item.description: An exemption that allowed low-value parcels shipped to the U.S. to avoid tariffs has ended, Trump administration officials say.

item.title: Abrego Garcia's ask judge to ban "baseless public attacks" by Trump admin.
item.description: Lawyers for Kilmar Abrego Garcia asked a judge on Thursday to bar DHS Secretary Kristi Noem and Attorney General Pam Bondi from making "inflammatory" ...

item.title: Senior CDC officials resign after Monarez ouster, cite concerns over scientific independence
